name: Flavouride
description: Sin descripción

name: SuperStar Ateez
description: SuperStar Ateez is a mobile gacha style rhythm-game focused around the hit 4th gen kpop group Ateez.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: DLC Pack 6 - Hitoshi Shinso
description: Play as Hitoshi Shinso in MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Hitoshi Shinso's costume.

name: Comix Breaker
description: Comix Breaker is a deckbuilding roguelike game optimized for the mobile platform. Defeat various monsters from comics with unique style. New comics are continuously updated and monsters evolve to get in your hair. Find your unique card and snack combinations. You will play a time-attack game with 5 opponents within a 20-minute time limit. Win in the Competitive Mode, and gain the honor of the winner as well as huge rewards!

name: Trainz Simulator 3
description: Trainz Simulator 3 delivers next-generation graphics and the most realistic train driving ​experience wherever you are. Take charge of steam electric or diesel locomotives and travel the world from the comfort of your home or while on the road.

name: Polus.gg
description: A free mod for Among Us, with new gamemodes, a new account system, and more!

name: Dying Light: The Following - Astronaut Bundle
description: Ready to bring your excitement to the moon? Fight off an alien invasion with this spacetastic equipment from Volkan!

name: Samurai Shodown: Baiken
description: This digital purchase will unlock the Guilty Gear Collaboration DLC character "???" for your copy of SAMURAI SHODOWN.

name: Mr. Krabs Tax Evasion
description: Play as Mr. Krabs in this Epic third person shooter. Experience a heartfelt story exploring themes of friendship, loss and gratitude all while evading the IRS.

name: The Dive
description: Linear underwater horror game about a search dive that quickly turns into fight for survival after an encounter with hellish creature.

name: Dwarves: Build and survive
description: You have to play as one of the surviving dwarves, take an axe and a hammer in your hands, and start building a new settlement, look for food, and defend against enemies.

name: Neon Nights Pinball
description: Neon Nights Pinball is an exciting eight flipper table featuring two upper play fields supporting seven primary missions, two skill shots and multi ball. This cyber punk styled machine blasts a nine minute custom soundtrack that will keep the action rolling. Now with Steam leaderboard support!!

name: 涨粉二维码
description: Sin descripción

name: Baklava Simulator
description: Build your own market. You can buy the materials to make the baklava and have it done by your staff. In addition, many functions of the content is located.

name: Cat Jump
description: Cat Jump is a simple platform game. help sissy and her friends through a world full of enemies and dangers. or survive in endless mode. Choose between 4 characters. The game is an indie game developed by a human. Climb up the wall to reach otherwise inaccessible platforms. Its a Speedrun game!

name: Emergency Crew: Volcano Eruption
description: Emergency Crew - an exciting strategy of selfless heroes in the time of a disaster! Embark on a heroic rescue mission! Remember - time is valuable! Save people from disaster!

name: Wall of Insanity
description: Wall of Insanity is a single player campaign third-person shooter, with a large arsenal of weapons, crowds of various enemies and difficult locations, concealing many secrets.

name: Tita Planet
description: Sin descripción

name: Confessions
description: Write down what burdens your soul or read confessions by other people.

name: Northern Journey
description: A norwegian happysad game set in a northern land! Adventure through a beautiful and very varied wildereness. Dive, fly, use ziplines and find different weapons to aid your journey to reach the cold mountains and below. Encounter over 50 unique bosses and enemy types!

name: 100 Days
description: 100 Days is a game that allows you to immerse yourself in the harsh world of one island, where you have to survive for 100 days. Build, explore the island and find secrets.

name: War Beasts
description: Free layout 3D tower defense war game. There are tanks and Titans on land, battleships and swarms in the sky, and missiles in space. In the face of the enemy, your weapons are not only machine guns, cannons, rockets, but also lasers, cruise missiles and interceptor satellites.

name: World of bombs
description: World of bombs is a game for 2 to 4 players. The goal of the game is to remain the only survivor. Place a bomb to destroy the environment. Сollect upgrades and win friends. There are 3 arenas in the game. For 2, 3 and 4 players.

name: Rush Rally Origins
description: Rush Rally Origins combines the classic top down racing action from the original Rush Rally with the highly praised graphics and physics from Rush Rally 3. Take on 36 new and unique stages across the world, each with the ability to change the time of day and weather. Drive over many challenging surface types including snow, gravel, dirt, mud and tarmac!

name: Zool Redimensioned
description: The Ninja of the Nth Dimension is back! Explore vibrant retro landscapes, discover hidden secrets and take down menacing bosses in a modern reimagining of the classic action platforming adventure Zool.

name: Aurum Online
description: Game that is being made live in Twitch by JeroMono. An action-MMORPG with cartoon style.

name: MakerKing
description: Become a King (or Queen) at making levels! Join a community designed around level creation and online play. The level editor is simple to use and lets you create anything, even living creatures!

name: VR Pianist
description: VR Pianist is a VR music game where you can play on virtual piano. Enjoy unique line-art graphic style together with contemporary, classical and orchestral music. Maybe you are the hidden talent waiting to be discovered!

name: Mortal Shell: The Virtuous Cycle
description:
Mortal Shell will be getting a DLC expansion called The Virtuous Cycle.

In a teaser revealed at IGN Expo 2021, the soulslike RPG offered us a look at a rainswept building, a forest of moving trees, and a character with what looks to be a new weapon that can switch freely between spear, axe, and dual sword forms.

name: Mayhem Brawler
description: Mayhem Brawler is an urban fantasy themed beat 'em up that brings back the 90s arcade vibe to the present day. With comic book style art and kick-ass soundtracks, it offers a unique experience that you can tackle solo or as co-op with friends while defining the next step in the story with your choices. The game is developed by Hero Concept studios.

name: Blazing Rangers
description:
Blazing Rangers is an original one-screen action game for NES-compatible hardware, realized in the style of '80s arcade games.

The setting and goal is easily explained: You are a firefighter with the task to rescue all kids from a dangerous fire site.

Equipped with a water hose, you can choose between two characters and will fight an ever-growing wall of fire and a plethora of dangerous enemies to open up the way and save the children. It's also important not to dawdle around - they might get burned if you don't take some risks and hurry to their rescue!

name: World Soccer Strikers'91
description: WSS'91 is here! Welcome to the 90's, kid! Action and graphics on par with the arcades! Up to 8 players at the same time in your own living room! A huge bunch of teams (like, at least 40)! Game modes like tournaments, leagues & everything! What if we both pay for half and swap it every other week?

name: Side Decide
description: The puzzle game that harks back to your childhood. Roll the cube across the board to the end. You can only roll onto a block with the corresponding face. On a circle, you can rotate opening up further choices and paths. Many more block types to be revealed.

name: Hell Architect
description: Hell Architect is a game about building and managing your own hell. You take on a role of a hell manager and are tasked with developing the underworld in a way that would make Lucifer himself fall off his chair.

name: Ambition: A Minuet in Power
description: A young woman finds herself alone in the streets of Paris, far from home and abandoned by the love of her life. In that moment, she decides to live for herself and seek her own passions, as France marches towards a violent uprising that will change history forever. Navigate the twisting social politics of pre-revolutionary Paris in a game world that’s different every time you play. Court, snub and seduce your way to the top of society. Extend your influence, uncover the intrigue of the coming revolution, and ensure that you end up on the winning side of history.

name: Cosmo's Quickstop
description: "Welcome to the fast-paced world of interstellar gas station management! As the new owner and operator of Cosmo’s Quickstop, your skills in customer service and multitasking will be your keys to success. Keep your establishment equipped with the finest amenities for customers on the go, including hot coffee showers, diamond deluxe shipwashes, and sparkling clean glorp rooms! With hard work and a bit of luck, you’ll be well on your way to owning the most popular attraction along Route 66 Million!"

name: Crossout: The Creation
description: Sin descripción

name: Viaja Baraja
description: Viaja Baraja is a Spanish-language visual novel where you play cards that represent your attitude and emotional state to have conversations with your friends and peers. Just out of high-school, Daira and her friends embark on a journey of self-discovery.

name: Ant Legion: For the Swarm
description:
Ant Legion: For The Swarm is a Strategy game developed by 37GAMES.

You are tasked with leading your ant colony to dominate the backyard of your neighbour's house. Despite their small size, these ants can become a force to be reckoned with under your expert guidance.

name: Boiling Over
description: Live your best life while combating the horrors of customer service and transphobia.

name: Porton Make a Sandwich: An Edible Adventure
description: I was gonna do some Radical Things today, but I'm really hungry...

name: Tender Feelings Like Water
description:
A yuri Eastern fantasy visual novel created for NaNoRenO 2020.

A water spirit sees a girl in red out on rainy days. The spirit and girl meet and meet again, slowly beginning to fall in love. Yet the rain fails to end. It is flood season, and the people beseech the local god to stop.

name: Two Peas in a pod
description: Two gays wander around an island and talk non-stop

name: Plus Kingdom Jailbreak
description: You are Quince, an unkillable werewolf. You have decided to be imprisoned for your entertainment. You cannot be stopped. However, the kingdom that imprisoned you has done more than just bother you. Punish them for their transgressions and return to your cave.

name: Mystic Gunner
description: Evade quickly and shoot without hesitation! You don't have to show mercy to your enemies. Prepare your gear and skills and explore random generated areas. Collect powerful weapons and equipment, dodge bullets and defeat all enemies while acquiring new skills! The roguelike elements are well designed, making the game very easy to control and offers an andrenaline-pumping gameplay.

name: Mystery Box: Hidden Secrets
description: A point-and-click puzzle game where you have to solve intriguing riddles around different boxes and discover some cool stories about popular inventions!

name: Purrfect Tale
description: This story is told through interactive comics. You'll need to consider and make your choices to progress. What will you do when the cat you take in turns into a human? What kind of outfit will you wear for your spring outing...? Each interaction will give you a chance to better understand your cat-eared youth. Each time you try your best, you'll have a chance to get one step closer to your dream. Each action you take will impact the continuation of the story. So, what kind of choices will you make?

name: Apex Legends: Bangalore Edition
description:
Includes:

- Exclusive Legendary “Super Soldier" Bangalore Skin
- Exclusive Legendary "Trusty Sidekick" G7 Skin
- Exclusive "Mark of a Hero" Gun Charm
- Exclusive "Striker" Badge
- 1000 Apex Coins

name: Inside Soccer
description: An indoor soccer/football game played by robots driven by you the player

name: Marvel's Avengers: Endgame Edition
description: Assemble your team of Earth's Mightiest Heroes, embrace your powers, and live your Super Hero dreams.

name: Robo-Boy Risky Venture
description: Robo-Boy Risky Venture is a game for platformer fans. The Robo Boy is embarking on an epic treasure journey! Collect all the jewels that get in your way and jump to the ports to get to new locations.

name: OctoQuest
description: Your Infamous Harp presents OctoQuest, a mash-up of your favorite retro NES games. Play as a highly evolved octopus on an eight-fold quest to retrieve extraterrestrial mushrooms from subterranean caves. Experience a cerebral journey through the ruins of mankind set to a bass-heavy soundtrack.

name: VR Lunar Base Skirmish: Control the Moon
description: This is a shooting survival game. Players need to pick up weapons to defend the moon base from being destroyed by the enemy, and use excellent shooting techniques to wipe out the invading enemy forces and defend the moon base.

name: Mike the Cat
description: Single Player Endless Runner

name: Humankind: Limited Edition
description:
Humankind Limited Edition (Amazon Exclusive Steelbook) includes:
- PC copy of the game
- Limited Edition Steel Case
- Two-sided "Decision" Coin
- HUMANKIND Digital Soundtrack
- Double-sided Unit & Tech Tree Poster
- HUMANKIND Notre-dame Pack
- Victor Hugo Avatar Set
- Boudicca Avatar Set
- Player Profile Decorations & Symbol Set

name: Squares: Brain Game
description: Sin descripción

name: The Far Kingdoms: Magic Mosaics
description: "The Far Kingdoms: Magic Mosaics" takes you on a challenging mosaic puzzle journey where you gather magic elements. These magic elements are refills for 4 mystical runes. These runes are the pillar of protection from the invasion of the evil dark magician that threatens the kingdom.

name: Mind-Blowing Girls 3
description: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: Cavegirl Adventures
description: Cavegirl adventures is a game for platformer fans. Jump across vibrant levels and collect giant eggs to feed your tribe. Watch out for sharp thorns and dangerous plants on your way to victory!

name: Slime Killer
description: Slime Killer is a top-down TDS action game where you have to destroy a huge number of slugs with a variety of weapons.

name: Doki Doki Gravity Dive
description:
Doki Doki Gravity Dive is a Score Attack Shoot 'em Up with tiny solar systems as your playground which are populated with tiny worlds and a singularity at their center.

Enemies relentlessly invade and it is up to you to keep them at bay. At least for as long as you can!

Each celestial body has its own gravitational pull and to stand even the slightest chance to survive the never ending onslaught, you have to adapt to changes in gravity quickly and throw concepts like up and down out the window!

So hop, fly, dodge, shoot and (hopefully) have fun!
...until the heat death of the universe.

name: Awesome Puzzle
description: Awesome Puzzle is an educational game for children in which you have to collect a picture from puzzles. The game has 12 levels, a pleasant atmosphere for children.Good music, nice graphics, mouse control, the game develops memory well.

name: Save Iron Globe
description: As a star pilot of the United Earth Federation, go into the Earth orbit and destroy the alien flagship to stop the invasion.

name: Chromatic Fantasy
description: Charming and challenging puzzle game, in which fantasy creatures are trying to escape the dungeon imprisonment. Interactions between characters and obstacles are determined by their color.

name: Joyspring
description: Ascend the peak in search of the Joyspring. Explore every cavern and cave, crevasse and chasm. Hear the wind sing. Keep dashing and find the spring. And when you return, return smiling.

name: Conquest of Elysium 5
description: Conquest of Elysium 5 is a quick turn based fantasy strategy game with a touch of rogue-like. The game is full of depth, details and monsters. There are also a huge number of factions, each with its own unique gameplay and magic rituals.

name: Madden NFL 22: Dynasty Edition
description:
The Dynasty Edition comes with:
- 3 Day early access
- Dual Entitlement
- Franchise: 100 Staff Points
- Face of the Franchise & The Yard: The General Player Class starting at Level 10
- Tom Brady Gear Capsule
- Choice of 1 out of 32 NFL Stars
- Choice of Brady or Mahomes Elite Item
- Exclusive Challenges during early access window
- Choice of Brady or Mahomes Curated Legends Pack
- 22 Team Fantasy Packs

name: Descent Vector: Space Runner
description: Race your space pod through a procedurally generated gauntlet of space stations, asteroids, and debris in this single-player sci-fi endless runner. Test your limits, experience wild crashes, improve your distance, visit unique solar systems and unlock new space pods to pilot.

name: Madden NFL 22: MVP Edition
description:
The MVP Edition includes:
- 3 Day early access
- Dual Entitlement
- Franchise: 60 Staff points
- Face of the Franchise & The Yard: The General player class starting at Level 10
- Tom Brady gear capsule
- Choice of 1 out of 32 NFL Stars
- Choice of Brady or Mahomes Elite Item
- Exclusive Challenges during early access window
- 11 Team Fantasy packs

name: The Thief Girl
description: The Thief Girl is a stealth mission game in which you control a thief girl to collect treasure and get to the goal. Use the mouse to guide the girl to the goal while keeping her hidden from the monsters. Use emergency evasion actions when the monsters are about to find you to conquer the stage.

name: Marvel's Avengers: Black Panther - War for Wakanda
description: Black Panther - War for Wakanda is an expansion for Marvel's Avengers. It introduces a new playable character, Black Panther, complete with his own gear and cosmetics. This expansion also includes new Villains like Klaw, a new enemy Faction, the new Wakandan Jungle Biome, a new Outpost, a Power Level cap increase, and much more.

name: Humankind: Day One Edition
description:
The Day One Edition of HUMANKIND includes:
- Humankind game
- Notre Dame DLC Pack
- Digital Soundtrack
- Boudicca Avatar Set (DLC)
- Player Profile Items

name: Couplinked
description: Couplinked is an action-arcade game with a unique control system where you control two different nodes at the same time. The objective of the game is to collect rings and avoid obstacles.

name: Far Away
description: Far Away is a visual novel full of dark humor depicting immersive storylines rather than romantic drama. You will play as Krosa, a typical girl who experiences gang conflicts, crimes, conspiracies, and family grudges in the port city of Bedjan.

name: Humankind
description: Humankind is a historical strategy game where you will re-write the entire narrative of humankind, a convergence of culture, history, and values that allows you to create a civilization that is as unique as you are. How far will you push humankind?

name: Young Souls
description: Young Souls combines the beat'em up and RPG genres in a world created with stunning art direction. Explore the world of humans and that of the goblins, both teeming with enemies but also full of unexpected and friendly encounters waiting to be discovered.

name: Low Gravity
description: Two-day speedmapping event following a "low gravity" theme with 10 small to medium-sized levels and a start hub. It runs on the SMP mod (included) and comes with a custom skybox and a music track.

name: D-Virus: Evil Menance
description:
D-Virus: Evil Menance is a short RPG made with RPG Maker MV to participate in the Major Jam, whose theme was Cosmic.

Playing as Melissa Casanova, you must use the power of your HERZ to fight against a deadly virus that spread through the Wittelsbach spaceship. The HERZ is the only way to fight these demons!

name: Harold and the Gameover
description: Harold wakes up in a dark place devoid of normal life, but filled with evil Reids who wish him harm! Can he find his way through!? Part of the Enter the Haroldverse game jam.

name: Arab Drift Cars
description: Start playing the Arab style, specifically Saudi Arabia, in the open world. You can explore, drift, race and much more

name: StarCat Major
description: A lo-fi space adventure.

name: Lunch Time in Burger Kingdom
description: An unlikely hero saves a kingdom.

name: Skybinder
description: Skybinder is a creative puzzle. Enjoy thinking spatially, playfully, and meditatively as you bind dots into shapes.

name: 1001 Jigsaw Detective
description: Reveal fantastic secrets with 1001 Jigsaw Detective. 500 detective puzzles!

name: The Devil's Shoes
description: When The Devil himself approaches you with an opportunity you cannot refuse a journey into your most perverse fetishes starts! A collection of interactive erotic stories!

name: New Meaning
description: In New Meaning you play as Luke Wilson, or do you? Luke is a struggling teenager trying to shed some light upon a dark lonely world, will you help him or will you aid his departure into depression? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Dice Tourney
description: Welcome to Dice Tourney. Take part in the legendary dice tournament and become a great champion!

name: Captain Collision
description: A top-down action game like no other. Use asteroids to block enemy bullets and smash enemy ships in this physics-based test of skill. Conquer 25 levels, vanquish 5 bosses, and maneuver through 5 tricky bonus waves.

name: Sengoku: A Time of Warriors and Demons
description: A 2D action platformer set in the Japanese Sengoku period that chronicles a warrior's quest to save his kingdom.

name: Imperivm: Great Battles of Rome - HD Edition
description:
Lead the battles that forged the greatest Empire of all time.

Seven civilizations fighting for glory or freedom: Rome, Aegyptus, Britannia, Germania, Gallia, Hispania, and Carthago.

Real ancient heroes who pass on their charisma and expertise in the troops under their command and make the difference between victory or defeat in battle.

Enjoy the fast-paced RTC “Real-Time Conquest” gameplay. An Old School RTS oriented to military conquest:

- Military conquest-oriented RTS
Focus on military strategy and drive your efforts on commanding your troops.

- RPG features, playing a key role in battles
The battles become more realistic when RPG features come into play.

- Storyline based on historical facts, scenarios, and characters
Each battle was designed with input from historical experts.

Command your army in a 40% larger battlefield
Where you can lead more units and face more enemies. An even bigger Strategy and Conquest challenge than the original.

New dedicated Multiplayer server
- Up to 8 players
- 1vs1, 2vs2, 3v3 and 4vs4
- 7 Civs - 90 unique warriors
- 5,000 units fighting simultaneously
- Maps throughout the Roman Empire.

Agile and powerful Imperivm HD In-Game Editor
Create your own maps and battles and share them with your friends and/or the Imperivm World Gamers Community.

name: Chess Gambit
description: Chess Gambit transports you to a low-poly environment where castles, tough soldiers, battle-hardened knights and loyal bishops are the true stars. Use your best strategies to open a path and conquer the castle of your opponent's king!

name: Geo-Duck
description: The rhythm platformer that anyone would have come up with. Featuring a dynamically generated glitch-hop soundtrack. Journey to Nirvana to discover the true meaning of your existence. Traverse 49 Pythonesque levels. You'll never hear the same game twice.

name: Sphere Game Epic
description: Sphere Game Epic is the newest in the Sphere Game series, with new mechanics and visuals, bringing more challenges to be overcome.

name: Last Village
description: Arriving on a hunt in a small village, you become a witness to attack of alien forces on the ground, armed with a shotgun, you decide to repulse the alien intruders.

name: Axial Disc 1
description: A modern turn-based deckbuilding JRPG involving party synergy for attacks that features unique pixel art and chiptune music!

name: Orenji-iro no Kumo
description: Orenji-iro no Kumo is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Coral Quest
description: An underwater running game, where Polly & friends cleanup plastic and debris to make their home a more habitable place. Matchala Games is donating 25% of all proceeds to help clean up our oceans. Powered by compelling graphics, cute characters, accessories and a unique 9 lane running system

name: Volleyball Challenge
description: Activate SUPERPOWERS – in this sports game you can add fireballs, vanishing balls, superspeed, blocks, and many others to your arsenal – play now and discover them for yourself! Develop your player's SKILLS – raise your stats across categories such as serve power and strength, stamina, or attack! You will have a bundle of additional outfits to choose from as well as bags with super contents to open – as long as you win matches! Make your opponents tremble at the sight of your player! Volleyball will never be the same – play Volleyball Challenge and be part of the sports revolution!

name: Ninja Stealth 4
description: Ninja Stealth IV is a new challenge for you. Be stealth, evade from lasers, cameras, motion detectors and security guards. Collect all computers to beat the game.

name: Untangle
description: Untangle is developed by UnityGameEngine, it is a first-person, single-player, school-violent-themed survival horror game. Though it's not a game based on a true story, it is built on an intention to raise awareness of school violence at the same time when you're playing a game.

name: Custom Machinery
description: Custom Machinery is a block based building game in which you can build vehicles and other machines, configure their parts and use them.

name: Overheat
description: Overheat is a sidescrolling platformer in which a robot climbs a city to get back to its home planet. How hard can that be?

name: The Doors of Trithius
description: The Doors of Trithius is a RPG roguelike set in a randomly generated fantasy world. Level your skills and overcome your foes as you traverse the mysterious world of Enalia.

name: Woody Chopper
description: In Woody Chopper you help Woody chop down the endless tree on his way to becoming a lumberjack millionaire. Whether in spring, summer, autumn or winter, it's the perfect casual game for in-between. Now with Achievements! Play Woody Chopper today and help Woody get the legendary axe.

name: Omnia
description: Omnia is an 2D platform adventure game created to help the player identify their own behavior. The game allows the player to embark on the world of their subconscious by putting them in front of decisions that need to be made based on emotions.

name: Radioactive Dwarfs: Evil From the Sewers
description: Blast through the sewers in Radioactive Dwarfs! Retro top-down shooter with NES-style pixel graphics and chiptune music. Help armed heroine search for her brother in underground dwarven settlement. Many enemies, items, secrets, and bonus levels. Thrilling adventure awaits!

name: Demon Strikes Back
description: Demon strikes back is a rogue-lite action game, across the abyssal fissure and beat all your foes! Seize their weapons, snatch their equipment, retrieve their relics, and reave their soul! The demon grows stronger than ever!

name: Lingering Legacy
description: The Dark God has ravaged the lands against his brother, letting his demons wage war through the once peaceful world. As the Guardian, you travel the land, purging the foul stain of the demons while in pursuit of the Fallen Guardian to restore balance once again.

name: Tizahl's Quest
description: Tizahl's Quest is an action RPG set in a 3D world. Unlock portals to more dangerous dungeons and find the evil demon to save the world! Learn magic and abilities and complete quests to obtain rare items!

name: Mercenary Operator: Wolves
description: Mercenary Operator: Wolves is a 2D top-down shooter with a focus on methodical, tactical gameplay.

name: Edda Café
description: Edda Café is a visual novel made by Mushroomallow. It's a cute and heartwarming, yet unusual Valentine-theme love story for Valentine VN Jam 2021 event.

name: Road 96
description: Road 96 is a crazy, beautiful road-trip. The discovery of exciting places, and unusual people on your own personal journey to freedom. An ever-evolving story-driven adventure inspired by Tarantino, The Coen Brothers, and Bong Joon-ho. Moments of action, exploration, contemplative melancholy, human encounters and wacky situations. Set against a backdrop of authoritarian rule and oppression. A stunning visual style, a soundtrack filled with 90s hits, and a thousand routes through the game combine so each player can create their own unique stories on Road 96.

name: Greak: Memories of Azur
description: Greak: Memories of Azur is a beautiful single-player puzzle platformer adventure. You will take the role of three siblings: Greak, Adara and Raydel to guide them through the lands of Azur. Alternate control between them and use their unique abilities to escape from the Urlag invasion.

name: Grotto of the Scorned
description: Big non linear level for Doom II, expect the difficulty to be on par with something like Plutonia.

name: Single Ennead
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowels of the Beast
description: Sin descripción

name: Witches Weed
description: Guide the cursed little blue Shaman through a sacred cave to obtain a holy herb called: "The Witches Weed". Each screen will present the little blue Shaman with a series of jumping challenges. Use the "B" button for a speed burst and the "A" button to jump. 16 screens in all, good luck!

name: ZJ the Ball: Level 1
description: Sin descripción

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 070.

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 063.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: MP067
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The DLC include map pack 067.

name: Tiger Striker: MP040
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 040.

name: Tiger Striker: MP038
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 038.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora! MP009
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The player controls a fighter to shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy Navy Cruiser/Battleship/Aircraft Carrier to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 009.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora! MP007
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy Navy Cruiser/Battleship/Aircraft Carrier to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 007.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP008
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The player control a fighter to shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemies to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 008.

"Second Wave" is for sale on Yastuna Games store, and add a Story mode to the Arcade experience. It is now also available as free download.

name: Raid on Tri City: Second Wave
description:
Raid on Tri City: Second Wave is an action puzzle title that mixes falling block gameplay with shooting. It is a physical release and an expanded version of the original "Raid on TriCity" that was download only.

The player controls a space ship on a playfield similar to the one of Tetris. The ship can freely be moved around the area as long as its part of a stacked block. New Tetrominoes drop down from the top of the screen. They cannot be moved or rotated, but they can be shot brick by brick. Scoring is done by creating lines, so careful shooting is required to either destroy the block completely or to make parts fit the gaps in the playfield to stack them properly and create lines. The shooting itself does not affect the score. Some of the falling blocks contain power-ups or enemies that can be destroyed or drop to add to the stack. Power-ups such as bombs can become dangerous when lines are formed and enemies restrict movement when part of the stack and can then only be taken out through lines. When the blocks reach a threshold near the top of the screen, the game is over.

EEPROM on the cartridge is used to save the game and store highscores. Also new to this release is the Story mode. It splits the gameplay into separate levels with a fixed goal to complete them, a narrative about aliens where the player has to save Congis Space Station and the AC2-K11 sector of the Galaxy, and some interactivity with a branching level path. The gameplay for Story is similar to the Arcade mode but there the only goal is to beat the highscore.

The playfield only takes up about 50% of the screen in the center. On the left there is a picture showing a control element of a space ship and the right part contains the HUD elements. In the Story mode the HUD shows the remaining time, the level objective such as the number of lines, bombs and bugs, and the number of bullets you can shoot at the same time. In the Arcade mode the HUD shows the score, the number of lines, the current level and the number of bullets you can shoot at the same time.
